code: import{SET_USER_STATE,USER_LOGGED_OUT,SET_USER_PROJECT,SET_USER_C_PROJECT}from'redux/actionsTypes';var setUserState=function setUserState(user){return{type:SET_USER_STATE,payload:{user:user}};};var userLoggedOut=function userLoggedOut(){return{type:USER_LOGGED_OUT};};var setUserProjectIds=function setUserProjectIds(projectIds){return{type:SET_USER_PROJECT,payload:{projectIds:projectIds}};};var setCurrentProject=function setCurrentProject(project){return{type:SET_USER_C_PROJECT,payload:{project:project}};};var authActions={setUserState:setUserState,userLoggedOut:userLoggedOut,setUserProjectIds:setUserProjectIds,setCurrentProject:setCurrentProject};export default authActions;
